member.name: T:WCSharp.ConstantGenerator.ConstantGenerator
member.summary: Entry point for generated WCSharp constant files.

member.name: M:WCSharp.ConstantGenerator.ConstantGenerator.Run(System.String,System.String,WCSharp.ConstantGenerator.ConstantGeneratorOptions)
member.param: The directory containing the map source files (source.w3x by default)
The output directory (the Source project folder by default)
Optional settings for the constant generation.

member.name: T:WCSharp.ConstantGenerator.ConstantGeneratorOptions
member.summary: Defines a set of optional parameters for constant generation.

member.name: P:WCSharp.ConstantGenerator.ConstantGeneratorOptions.IncludeCode
member.summary:
Whether to include the FourCC code in the name of constants outputted.
Example: 'ABILITY_A001_FIREBALL' if true, or 'ABILITY_FIREBALL' if false.
Defaults to false.
